events.name: Bi-Monthly (bi-weekly) BTC in SG Meetup!
events.description: Eddy Azar of OneBit is hosting a bi-weekly (twice a month) bitcoin meetup. Let's all get together where delicious food & drinks are sold for BTC, hobnob about the bitcoin lifestyle & entrepreneurship scene in town, and kick this meetup off. If you're interesting in giving a talk to the BTC community in SG, sharing your idea & startup, getting beta users, etc., let me know. We're looking to have a few meetups with awesome speakers & thought leaders starting the night's conversation.

events.name: Agile Testing Success - Key Factors - By Janet Gregory
events.description: Please register here to attend. * How is testing different for successful agile projects?* How can agile development teams employ testers’ skills and experience for maximum value to the project? Janet Gregory describes key factors she has identified for agile teams to succeed, including the whole-team approach of agile development that enables testers to do their job effectively. From guiding development with examples to testing that we built the right thing. Explore the agile testing mindset that contributes to a team’s success, and learn the role that test automation plays in the fast-paced development within agile projects. By adhering to core agile practices while keeping the bigger picture in mind, testers add significant value to and help ensure the success of agile projects. Agenda: 7.00 PM: Snacks & Social7.30 PM: Talk begins8.30 PM: Q&A, Social9.00 PM: Done Special instructions: Need NRIC/ID at the gantry downstairs to go up to Suntec Tower Five. Go up to the 9th floor. There will be signage/volunteers to bring them there. Registration URL: https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/agile-testing-success-key-factors-by-janet-gregory-tickets-20993163116
events.location: PayPal, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985, Singapore

events.name: Azure and .NET User Group meetup Feb 2016
events.description:
Gong Xi Fa Cai... Once again we starting new wave with this new year. Let us get together and learn new stuff and updates about Microsoft Azure and .NET technologies 


1. Azure news round up, By Mohamed Faizal, Azure MVP 2. Integrating on-Prem identities with AAD Connect and Implementing secure access to cloud resources By Sakthis Kumar, Community Member  3. Packaging your source .NET Libraries, By Punit Ganshani,  .NET MVP.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: Making Music! HackerspaceSG Awesome Talks, February 2016
events.description:
This month we explore the creation of music!

--

Music Technology: Creating your own Music Instrument
Dirk Stromberg

Dirk will share about what made him want to create his own music instrument (and his jealousy of saxophonists) and how he goes about creating the instrument from scratch with readily-available and inexpensive electronic components. Most importantly, he will give an exciting live demonstration of the instrument. 

--

Music Production: Insights into the Process of Film Scoring
Alex Oh

Prolific composer, Alex will introduce us to the process of film scoring and share with us his experience composing for local movies.

--

Useful Tips: Capturing Quality Vocal Recordings 
Ian Tan

The most common question in most bedroom artists’ minds is whether they have recorded their vocals right. Ian will share the principles behind getting a usable vocal recording and what he learnt from assisting top US engineers and producers (including a Motown Funk Brother).
